text:
- We are a global leader for
payments in open banking.

We have a market in
United States and Europe.
Our previous architecture,
we are working with a solution

that was hard to scale,
hard to provide new users,
you know, hard to create new dashboards.
We decided to use AWS on this solution

because you think that it
bring to us the scalability.
It's easy to grow.

Of course, as our
environment is already there,
it's easy to management this data as well.
That's why we decide to move
to this new technology using QuickSight
and the Redshift as well.
We centralize all of our data

from many different
sources into the Redshift.

Then you can manage and create,
like, materialized views
to bring knowledge
and insights for risk team, business team,

and other teams to work
with our data then.
Since the beginning,

we implement the DevOps
framework and mindset.

All of these tools help
us to work with versioning
and, you know, control the change

and make sure that all of our
security standards is there.
Now we can have a better catalog,
a better way to work with the team,
and now we can say that we know which data

that we have that now is
helping us to create new modules
and improve our authorization rate
and experience for our customers.
(upbeat music)
(upbeat music fades)
